H0.text: Heat is the form of energy that must be present for a shadow to occur under a tree.

H1.text: Light is the form of energy that must be present for a shadow to occur under a tree.

H2.text: Sound is the form of energy that must be present for the shadow under a tree to occur.

H3.text: Mechanical energy must be present for a shadow under a tree to occur.

A4.text: A shadow is a dark area on a surface where light from a light source is blocked by an object.

A5.text: The only astronomical objects able to project visible shadows onto Earth are the Sun, the Moon, and in the right conditions, Venus or Jupiter.
